page.name: Stormhawk VII
page.description: An ancient weapon created by a joint effort between the Ice Giants and the Storm Giants. It hums and glows with the power of the tempestuous north. Switches between Energy and Ice elements with every hit. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Stormhawk VII
properties.description: An ancient weapon created by a joint effort between the Ice Giants and the Storm Giants. It hums and glows with the power of the tempestuous north. Switches between Energy and Ice elements with every hit. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: The First Guardian
page.description: Midway up a mountain, the Ice Gate, and its Guardian, are waiting for you. It's now time to attune yourself to the gate, so you can help recapture of Isathaara and deal with Nivalis once and for all.

properties.name: The First Guardian
properties.description: Midway up a mountain, the Ice Gate, and its Guardian, are waiting for you. It's now time to attune yourself to the gate, so you can help recapture of Isathaara and deal with Nivalis once and for all.
properties.complete: Now that you have become attuned to the final gate, it's time to take the fight to Nivalis.
